Summary: Ball of light that expanded to a big bell shape of light
trends: There have been no other sightings in Mount Albert
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy Wife seen her first UFO last night !!! me and my wife where sitting out side around 11:30 at night when I notice several small balls of light ..very tiny and way up in the air like a small white dot.. going by ...2 small spots...whizzing by at a very hi rate of speed.. and then to the left .. the same ball of tiny light when all of a sudden , it lite up in huge ball of white red and orange colours about 50 times the size of light it was giving off .. it did it twice.. like an huge explosion ... then it stopped ..and reduced its light to the original size and disappeared ..
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
